context.description: connects an SPL data flow graph to the Watson IoT Platform as a device that sends events to applications and receives commands from them

parameter.name: commandData
parameter.description: an output attribute of type 'rstring' or 'blob' for data recieved from the Watson IoT Platform with a command

parameter.name: comandFormat
parameter.description: optionally, an output attribute of type 'rstring' for the format of the data recieved from the Watson IoT Platform with a command, with no default

parameter.name: commandName
parameter.description: an output attribute of type 'rstring' for the name of the command recieved from the Watson IoT Platform

parameter.name: deviceCredentials
parameter.description: the name of a file containing Watson IoT Platform device credentials

parameter.name: eventData
parameter.description: an input attribute of type 'rstring' that will be sent to the Watson IoT Platform as event data

parameter.name: eventFormat
parameter.description: an input attribute of type 'rstring' that specifies the format of the data sent to the Watson IoT Platform, defaulting to 'json' if not specified

parameter.name: eventName
parameter.description: an input attribute that will be sent to the Watson IoT Platform as the event name

parameter.name: eventQOS
parameter.description: the 'quality of service' for events sent to the Watson IoT Platform, either '0' or '1' or '2', defaulting to '0' if not specified

inputPortSet.description: input port for tuples to be sent as events to applications via the Watson IoT Platform

outputPortSet.description: output port for tuples received as commands from applications via the Watson IoT Platform
